version_description:
Fixed
- Multiple rare bugs

Updated
- Change Price disabled message now includes 'price reduction extra'

Sellers and Landlords can now manage offers for properties in Scotland.

Sellers and Landlords can now more easily see your feedback ratings.

Fixes several bugs.

We listen to your feedback and regularly release new versions of our app. Every update to the Purplebricks app fixes bugs and improves reliability.
If you've had a good experience with the app please consider leaving us a review. If you have problems related to the app please contact app@purplebricks.com or go to https://www.purplebricks.com/contact-us for any other questions.

New Features

* UI Updates / Improvements
* Buyer’s can now leave feedback on viewings
* Buyer’s can now make offers on properties for sale

Alongside this you'll see many UI changes and various bug fixes throughout the app with many more to follow soon!

We listen to your feedback and regularly release new versions of our app. The latest update includes:

- Significant updates to the Landlord/Tenant negotiation process, offering an increased range of negotiating options. (UK only)
- Fixes to bugs when booking tours. (US only)
- Fixes to map view on property search. (US only).

If you've had a good experience with our app, leave us a review! If you do find a problem, drop us a line at app@purplebricks.com or go to https://www.purplebricks.co.uk/contact-us for any other questions.

Major changes for the app have arrived! We've listened closely to your feedback and completely redesigned how the app looks and feels. It's now much simpler to use, allowing for an all-round better experience that’s easy on the eyes!
We've also squashed those pesky bugs relating to push notifications, alongside fixing a whole bunch of others!
Thank you to everyone who supplied us their invaluable feedback and please keep this going so we can create the best app possible together.
Store updates for a quicker glance at those shiny new app screenshots as well as some small bug fixes and tweaks.
